men behind the center line. The new
provision provides for "all cases

players in the attack goal area and
one player in each of the two wing
areas.

starting play, the players shall be immediately released from the two
areas."

season of 1937.

off. The old ruling provided for three
men behind the center line. The new
provision provides for "all cases
where the ball is forced in the center of the field each team shall confine the goal tender and two other
players in the defense goal area, two
players in the attack goal area and
one player in each of the two wing
areas.
When the whistle sounds
starting play, the players shall be immediately released from the two
areas."
For infraction of the offside rule
the penalty is 30 seconds instead of
the former 60 second layoff.
